name: StakeLab
description: Staking & Relaying Hub for Cosmos ecosystem.

name: Stakeflow
description: Stakeflow is a reliable and secure non-custodial validator that has been running since 2018. We focus on providing public goods for our delegators and supported chains. Check our block explorer https://stakeflow.io and website https://validator.stakeflow.io for more information.

name: Stakin
description: Experienced enterprise validator running Proof-of-Stake nodes for the Cosmos ecosystem and beyond.

name: Meria
description: Meria is a professional blockchain infrastructure provider aiming to make these technologies available and open to everyone.
